definition: to stay idle at home/to have resigned from office/to be unemployed/to have been fired/to be on a sabbatical
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with

sentences.english: Now, I stay idle at home, can I file in the where?
sentences.chinese: 現在我賦閒在家，請問我的檔案在什麼地方？

sentences.english: During the depression; millions of the unemployed wandered around in the streets.
sentences.chinese: 經濟疏落時期，有好幾百萬的賦閒者在街頭遊蕩。

sentences.english: I can't understand why a man of about 40 should not work for three years.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白爲什麼一個40歲左右的男人要賦閒三年。
